column3: sɛ mfom bɔto obi awerɛfir mu a
column4: hom a hom yɛ sunsummufo no mfa tsema ndan nyia ɔafom no. Na hwɛ woho yie

column2: "Hom nsoasoa hom mu kor biara n'adzesoa
column3: na dɛm no hom ahyɛ Kraest mbra ma."

column2: "Na sɛ obi bu noho dɛ ɔyɛ obi
column3: wɔ aber kor a ɔnnyɛ obiara a

column2: "Na hom mma obiara nsɔ nankasa n'edwuma nhwɛ
column3: nna obenya noara no ho biribi dze ahyehyɛ noho

column2: "Hom mma nyia wɔrekyerɛkyerɛ no asɛm no mu no mmema nyia ɔrekyerɛkyerɛ no no wɔ ndzepa nyina mu."
"Mma hom nndaadaa homho; Onyankopɔn wonnsi no atwetwe; dza nyimpa dua no
"Na nyia odua ma nankasa no honam no
column4: na nyia odua ma Sunsum no fi Sunsum mu bobu onnyiewiei nkwa."

column2: "Mma hom mma yɛmmberɛ wɔ papayɛ mu

column3: sɛ yenya ber a ɔsɛ a
column4: hom mma yɛnyɛ papa mma nyimpa nyina
column5: nkanka hɔn a wɔyɛ gyedzi fifo no."

column2: "Hom nhwɛ akyerɛw akɛse a medze mankasa me nsa akyerɛw rebrɛ hom no."
"Dodow a wɔpɛ dɛ hɔn enyim ba nyam wɔ honam mu no
column3: hɔn na wɔhyɛ hom dɛ hom ntwa twatsia
column4: dɛ mbrɛ ɔbɛyɛ ma wɔnnkɛtseetsee hɔn wɔ Kraest mbeamudua ho ara ntsi a."

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔagye twatsiatwa no mpo hɔnankasa nndzi mbra no do
column3: na wɔrohwehwɛ dɛ hom twa twatsia

column4: gyedɛ hɛn Ewuradze Jesus Kraest mbeamudua no mu
column5: ɔno do na wɔnam abɔ wiadze mbeamudua mu ama me
column6: na wɔabɔ mo so mbeamudua mu ama wiadze."

column2: "Na nnyɛ twatsiatwa anaa monomonomyɛ na ɔyɛ biribi
"Na dodow a wodzi dɛm nhyehyɛɛ yi do no
column3: asomdwee nye mbɔbɔrhu mbra hɔn nye Nyankopɔn ne Israel no do."
mma obi nntseetsee me: osiandɛ mowɔ Jesus n'akam wɔ me nyimpadua ho."
hɛn Ewuradze Jesus Kraest adom nka hom sunsum. Amen."
